name: Reunion (itch) (Elena Andrikian)
description:
Play a desperate young man who starts a journey to find back his beloved.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

This game has been made in two days during the January 2021 Global Game Jam..

---------------------------------------------------------------------
My roles : Level designer/builder and Narrative designer

Buddies : 

- Hugo Cluzel : https://petite-bryndye.itch.io/ (C# programmer and Narrative designer)
- Jules Rouault : https://polipot.itch.io/ (2D artist, Sound designer and Voice actor as Him)

- Manon Ratie : Voice Actress as Her
